pageHeader.title: I-35 at Belt Line Road, January 2015

text: This section of I-35 is being expanded with managed and regular lanes in the 2014-2017 period. At Belt Line Road, the frontage roads are being raised above the railroad tracks, and the I-35 main lanes are being elevated above the frontage roads.

images.caption: Looking northbound across Belt Line Road.
This footing in the foreground is for the southbound frontage road, which will be elevated.
Looking northbound along the southbound frontage road.
The debris in the foreground is from a warehouse-style structure that was cleared for the project.
